findings.rationale: A five-year duration for confidentiality may not be sufficient for all types of sensitive information, potentially exposing parties to risk after the term ends.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: The clause allowing for injunctive relief without posting bond could lead to misuse or abuse by the Disclosing Party, creating an imbalance in the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: Therefore, the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Strict assignment restrictions may hinder business operations and limit the ability to transfer rights or obligations in future transactions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
